name: MSM Risk Management
overview:
MSM Risk Management are one of the leading risk engineering software specialists. They have been working for over eleven years with leading insurance groups in the Lloyds and London markets, earning praise as being the “leading risk engineering subject matter expert”. Clients have demonstrated big returns by investing in risk engineering software in the following classes:

Property, casualty, liability Motor Professional indemnity

MSM Risk Management work with leading insurers to understand risk and develop best practice software applications that enable them to assess and mitigate client risk.
